Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli

Class Cli

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.Cli
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class Cli extends Object implements UserInterface, PropertyChangeListener
This class is the CLI of the game. It has attributes and methods that allow the player to correctly play the game and to correctly display various messages and data based on the local state of the game.
Author:
Luca Guffanti, Daniele Ferrario

      public void run()

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      PropertyChangeListener overridden method. It this application, the method is only called when the ClientState in the StateContainer is updated. Here, the cli will render a view depending on which attribute has been updated.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - A PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source and the property that has changed.
      See Also:
      • StateContainer

    • dispatchMessageToNetwork

      public void dispatchMessageToNetwork(Message message)
      Dispatch the message to the network handler. Called after a Command handler execution.
      Parameters:
      message - the message that should be dispatched to the network
      See Also:
      • CliCommandHandler

    • renderCliView

      public void renderCliView(CliView view)
      Render the requested view. Called after a Command handler execution or a state update that require a view change.
      Parameters:
      view - the view that will be rendered
      See Also:
      • CliCommandHandler
